Series I: Appetite for Life: The Biography of Julia Child
Noël Riley Fitch Julia Child Papers
Noël Riley Fitch Julia Child Papers
Subseries D: Publication, Publicity and Reception
Subseries D: Publication, Publicity and Reception

Subseries D: Publication, Publicity and Reception generally follows original order, but is arranged chronologically when material is dated. It consists of material related to the publication of Appetite for Life including book proposals and correspondence with publishers, as well as post-publication materials including correspondence and ephemera related to publicity of the book, reviews and correspondence related to reception, correspondence and documents related to film rights, and correspondence and research materials related to articles and writing by Noël Riley Fitch on Julia Child following publication of the biography.
